devdoc.details: A contract that allows the registration of credential types.      Credential types are unique per creator and type name.

TypeAdminTransferred(uint160,address,add.details: Emitted when the admin of a type is transferred

TypePublicSignalGetterUpdated(uint160,ui.details: Emitted when the intrinsic signal indexes are updated for a type

params.publicSignalGetter: address of the public signal getter

TypeRegistered(uint160,address,string,st.details: Emitted when a new type is registered

params.admin: Address of the admin of the type.
params.name: Name of the type
params.resourceURI: Mutable resource URI for the type
params.typeID: Unique identifier for the registered type

TypeResourceURIUpdated(uint160,string,st.details: Emitted when the resource URI of a type is updated

params.typeID: Unique identifier for the type being updated

TypeVerifierUpdated(uint160,uint8,addres.details: Emitted when a proof verifier is updated for a type

calcTypeID(address,string).details: calculate the typeID of a type

getType(uint160).details: get the type for the given typeID

getTypeAdmin(uint160).details: Retrieve the admin of a type

returns._0: address of the admin of the type

getVerifier(uint160,uint8).details: get the verifier for the given typeID and verificationStackID.

isRevocable(uint160).details: check if the type is revocable

isTypeFullyInitializedForStack(uint160,u.details: check if the type is fully initialized for the given verification stack.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

registerType(bool,string,string,string,s.details: register a new type by msg.sender

params.name: type name
params.resourceURI: resource URI of the type, mutable

params.name: Type name
params.publicSignalGetter: public signal getter for the type
params.resourceURI: Mutable resource URI of the type

returns._0: typeID Unique identifier of the registered type

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.name: name of the type
params.resourceURI: mutable resource URI of the type
params.typeId: the type id of the primitive type

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferTypeAdmin(uint160,address).details: transfer the ownership of a type.

updateTypePublicSignalGetter(uint160,uin.details: update the public signal getter for a type

params.getter: the address of the public signal getter

updateTypeResourceURI(uint160,string).details: update the resource URI of a type

params.uri: new resource URI TODO: resource URI specifcation: support multiple verification stack.

updateTypeVerifier(uint160,uint8,address.details: update the verifier for a type

_psGetters.details: mapping from typeID to its verification stack's intrinsic value .verifier typeID => verificationStackID => verifier

_verifiers.details: mapping from typeID to its verification stack's verifier.verifier typeID => verificationStackID => verifier

devdoc.title: TypeRegistry

registerType1Step(bool,string,string,str.notice: Register a new type by `msg.sender` with verifier and public signal getter set for a specific verification stack.

setPrimitiveType(uint160,string,string,s.notice: set a primitive type, only callable by the admin.

userdoc.notice: Getters in this contract does not do any parameter validation,         so callers should validate the inputs and outputs and uninitialized values will be zero.
